todos.content: Create atomic inventory update function with audit trail
Deploy and configure Supabase Edge Function for inventory updates
Implement inventory validation and concurrency control
Test atomic inventory updates with various scenarios
Create audit trail system for inventory changes
Implement error handling and validation for inventory updates
Build and test API client integration for inventory updates
Update documentation with new audit trail and atomic update features
Final testing and verification of audit trail implementation
Create example curl requests for testing the API
Create SQL script to query audit trail records
Implement notification system for inventory adjustments
